title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Digital Economics Practical Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical training course for professionals to apply digital economics theories in real-world settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of digital platform economy models (network effects, data economics, etc.) by applying them to practical cases
Learners can design a data-driven decision-making framework to analyze digital economic phenomena (cryptocurrencies, sharing economy, etc.)
Learners can visually represent and interpret economic concepts using digital learning tools (visualization software, simulation programs)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
